title: Xamarin Android 4.8.00013 & iOS 1.3.250.0 Patched Executable
description:
Patched files 
Xamarin.Android 4.8.0
Xamarin.iOS 1.3.250
--------------------------------------
Product: Xamarin.Android, Xamarin.iOS
Website: http://xamarin.com/
--------------------------------------

INSTRUCTIONS

1. Download and install the Xamarin Installer from the Official Website.
2. Copy "mandroid.exe" to "C:Program Files (x86)MSBuildXamarinAndroid" (or "C:Program FilesMSBuildXamarinAndroid" if you are on a 32-bit operating system).
3. Copy "mtouch.exe" to "C:Program Files (x86)MSBuildXamariniOS" (or "C:Program FilesMSBuildXamariniOS" if you are on a 32-bit operating system).
4. ???
5. Profit!

Download and install in the following order:
1. GTK# - http://download.xamarin.com/GTKforWindows/Windows/gtk-sharp-2.12.21.msi
2. Xamarin.Android - http://download.xamarin.com/MonoforAndroid/Windows/mono-android-4.8.00013.msi
3. Xamarin.iOS - http://download.xamarin.com/MonoTouchforVisualStudio/Windows/Xamarin.iOS_Setup-1.3.250.0.msi
4. Xamarin Studio - http://download.xamarin.com/studio/Windows/XamarinStudio-4.0.10-7.msi
